conbody.p: power controlThe teacher perform power/on/off, logout and reboot actions on student workstations for individual workstation, group or the whole class.
conbody.note: Please note that Power on action is not available for a group because a powered off computer can not be a member of any groups.
conbody.p: Student workstation network interface has to be set up in a certain way (see ) for the remote Power on to function properly.
Select Power control from the student menu (see ) and then select appropriate item from the sub-menu to perform power control actions on a single workstation.
Press Remote control button in the group tab menu (see ), select Power control and then select appropriate item from the sub-menu to perform power control actions on a group of workstations.
conbody.note: Please note that Power on action is not available for a group because a powered off computer can not be a member of any group.
conbody.p: Press Remote control button in the class tab menu (see ), select Power control and then select appropriate item from the sub-menu to perform power control actions on all workstations.
